directions: Whisk mayonnaise, chicken broth, soy sauce, lemon juice, chipotles and brown sugar in medium bowl to blend. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. (Dressing can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Mix lettuce, tomatoes and corn in large bowl. Add dressing and 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese and toss to coat. Sprinkle with remaining 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese and serve.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoon minced canned chipotle chilies (in adobo sauce)
1 large head romaine lettuce, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 cup frozen corn kernels, thawed, drained
title: Southwestern Caesar Salad with Chipotle Dressing
